title: New: Pumarosa – Cecile
body:
Oh boy.

Been waiting for what feels like an eternity for this – the second offering from London five piece **Pumarosa**. The follow-up to 2015’s hugely ambitious debut single, Priestess, new track _Cecile_ is equally as innovative, opening with a riff not a million miles from Scott Walker’s Jackie, Isabel Munoz-Newsome’s opulent vocals dominate and enslave the track. Don’t sleep on this. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
